column3: ACK on this being the correct backport, but I would prefer to see 1 pull with the soft fork logic and all accompanying implementations backported at the same time.   I think it would be much safer to test and review it together like that.  Lets wait until we have the soft fork logic finished and merged.\n
I added #7187 to this backport.\n
ACK `3a99feb`  (backported myself and got the same code)\n

Mechanical backport check ACK 26e9a05cc3192ce19b7c46043aeb12230d3207a5

Ran the following script:

```
while read F L; do git show $F | egrep -v '^index ' | egrep -v '^commit ' | egrep -v '^@@ ' >/tmp/f; git show $L | egrep -v '^index ' | egrep -v '^commit ' | egrep -v '^@@ ' >/tmp/l; diff /tmp/f /tmp/l; done
```

with input:
12c89c918534f8e615e80381b692d89d6b09d174 159ee3dd90490eabf6c048
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7543/commits/26e9a05cc3192ce19b7c46043aeb12230d3207a5 ACK, backport matches \n
cherry-picked #7531 6ba8b2a6c4d1bc393dd7c4734090a4c0dfa750c2 as caf1381 - one line including `bit68-sequence.py` in extended tests array.\n
ACK caf138122decac7d96b2f53c0c894277cb0f33ca\n
backport matches, tACK caf1381\n
Added trivial comment edit from #7773 as c270b62\n
utACK\n
utACK c270b62. My nits can be fixed later\n
utACK, checked with sipa's script\n
@MarcoFalke I cherry-picked your int/float fixes for RPC tests, from #7778 commit fa2cea1 in 640666b\n
utACK 640666b\n
ACK     3a99feb\n
This should explicitly be int. Sadly, py2 will silently cast the float to int where needed.\n
This should be int. (see previous comment)\n
the first arg to CTxOut should be int explicitly (see previous comment).\n

I'd be surprised if this worked. (You are passing the CTxOut into int())

Edit: You could just try a `git cherry-pick ...; git reset HEAD~; git commit qa/rpc-tests/bip*`
Fixed.\n
